title: Define Drone Hardware Requirements
description: Research and document the necessary hardware for climate control drones considering factors such as battery life, sensor capabilities, and communication methods.

title: Design Drone Firmware Architecture
description: Design the firmware architecture for climate control drones to manage and interpret sensor data, make decisions, and execute climate control actions.

title: Develop Climate Modeling Algorithms
description: Create algorithms for climate modeling to predict temperature, humidity, and other climatic factors in agricultural settings.

title: Design User Interface for Climate Control Drones
description: Design an intuitive and responsive user interface for managing the climate control drones.

title: Implement Communication Protocol for Drones
description: Develop a communication protocol between the climate control drones and the ground station or other control devices.

title: Integrate Sensor Data with Climate Modeling Algorithms
description: Integrate sensor data into the climate modeling algorithms for real-time climate control.

title: Write Unit Tests for Drones and Algorithms
description: Write unit tests for the drone hardware, firmware, and climate control algorithms.

title: Document Climate Control Drone System
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the climate control drone system, including hardware specifications, software architecture, and operating procedures.
